flashcards.notes: Additional body part vocabulary to supplement previous lessons

flashcards.kikuyu: Size Descriptors with Noun Class Agreement
flashcards.english: Mũtĩ mũceke/mwarĩĩ (thin tree/large tree), Gĩkabu gĩceke/kĩarĩĩ (small basket/large basket), Kĩmũbira/Mũbira/Kamũbira (very large ball/ball/small ball - augmentative/normal/diminutive), Ng'ombe noru/hũnju (fat cow/thin cow), Mũndũ mũkũhĩ/mũraihu/mũceke/mũtungu (short person/tall person/thin person/fat person)
flashcards.notes: Size and shape vocabulary showing noun class agreement. Diminutive/augmentative: Ka-/Kĩ- prefixes change size. Adjectives: -ceke (thin/small), -arĩĩ/-raihu (large/tall), noru/mũtungu (fat), hũnju/mũceke (thin)

flashcards.english: Mũrango (door), Kabatĩ (cupboard/cabinet/wardrobe), Metha (table), Gĩtĩ (chair), Gaturwa/Njĩgĩwa (stool/small table), Ndirica (window)
flashcards.notes: Essential sitting room furniture vocabulary (indo cia gĩtĩrĩro). Note synonym: Gaturwa/Njĩgĩwa both mean stool
